title: 18-152f11-th.gif
description: Spherical waves coming from a point source. The solution of the initial-value problem for the wave equation in three space dimensions can be obtained from the solution for a spherical wave. Image by Oleg Alexandrov on Wikimedia, including MATLAB source code.

image_metadata.caption: Spherical waves coming from a point source. The solution of the initial-value problem for the wave equation in three space dimensions can be obtained from the solution for a spherical wave. (Image by Oleg Alexandrov on [Wikimedia](http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Spherical_wave2.gif), including MATLAB source code.)
image_metadata.credit: Image by Oleg Alexandrov on Wikimedia, including MATLAB source code.
image_metadata.image-alt: Animated image of spherical waves coming from a point source.
